name: HTML Basics
description: Create a basic HTML webpage with headings, paragraphs, and links.

name: CSS Styling
description: Style the HTML webpage using CSS to make it visually appealing.

name: JavaScript Interactivity
description: Add interactivity to the webpage using JavaScript, such as form validation.

name: Machine Learning Basics
description: Implement a linear regression model using Python and scikit-learn.

name: Neural Networks
description: Build a simple neural network for image classification using TensorFlow.

name: Natural Language Processing
description: Develop a text sentiment analysis model using NLP techniques.

name: Cybersecurity Fundamentals
description: Identify common vulnerabilities in a given network and propose mitigation strategies.

name: Penetration Testing
description: Conduct a penetration test on a simulated system and report findings.

name: Cryptography
description: Implement a basic encryption/decryption algorithm in Python.

name: Exploiting Vulnerabilities
description: Identify and exploit vulnerabilities in a provided system for educational purposes.

name: Ethical Hacking Report
description: Document the ethical hacking process and provide recommendations for security improvements.

name: Secure Coding Practices
description: Review and improve the security of a codebase by identifying and fixing vulnerabilities.

name: Digital Logic Design
description: Design and simulate basic digital logic circuits using a software tool.

name: Sequential Circuits
description: Implement sequential circuits with flip-flops and analyze their behavior.

name: Microcontroller Programming
description: Write assembly code to control a microcontroller and perform specific tasks.

name: Assembly Language Basics
description: Write simple assembly language programs to perform arithmetic operations.

name: Microprocessor Interfacing
description: Interface external devices with a microprocessor and write code for data transfer.

name: Embedded Systems Project
description: Develop a small embedded systems project using a microcontroller and peripherals.
